00038 namespace {
00039 
00040   const char *usage =
00041     "\n"
00042     "  usage: freebase_load <file>\n"
00043     "\n"
00044     "  Loads a freebase .tsv file into a table called\n"
00045     "  freebase with the following schema:\n"
00046     "\n"
00047     "create table freebase (\n"
00048     "  name,\n"
00049     "  category,\n"
00050     "  property\n"
00051     ");"
00052     "\n"
00053     "  This program assumes that the first line in the\n"
00054     "  .tsv file contains the column names and that the\n"
00055     "  first two columns are 'name' followed by 'id'.\n"
00056     "  The 'id' column is used as the row key and the\n"
00057     "  name of the file (minus the .tsv extension) is\n"
00058     "  taken as the category.\n";
00059 
00060   const int RETRY_TIMEOUT = 30;
00061 
00062 }
00063 
00064 
00065 
00069 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00070   freebase_parser parser;
00071   ClientPtr client_ptr;
00072   TablePtr table_ptr;
00073   TableMutatorPtr mutator_ptr;
00074   KeySpec key;
00075   const char *inputfile;
00076   String row;
00077   InsertRec *recs;
00078   int count;
00079 
00080   if (argc == 2)
00081     inputfile = argv[1];
00082   else {
00083     cout << usage << endl;
00084     return 0;
00085   }
00086 
00087   parser.load(inputfile);
00088 
00089   try {
00090 
00091     // Create Hypertable client object
00092     client_ptr = new Client( System::locate_install_dir(argv[0]) );
00093 
00094     // Open the 'free' table
00095     table_ptr = client_ptr->open_table("freebase");
00096 
00097     // Create a mutator object on the
00098     // 'LogDb' table
00099     mutator_ptr = table_ptr->create_mutator();
00100 
00101   }
00102   catch (Exception &e) {
00103     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00104     return 1;
00105   }
00106 
00107   while ((recs = parser.next(&count)) != 0) {
00108     for (int i=0; i<count; i++) {
00109       try {
00110         mutator_ptr->set(recs[i].key, recs[i].value, recs[i].value_len);
00111       }
00112       catch (Exception &e) {
00113         HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00114         _exit(1);
00115       }
00116     }
00117   }
00118 
00119   // Flush pending updates
00120   try {
00121     mutator_ptr->flush();
00122   }
00123   catch (Exception &e) {
00124     cerr << "Exception caught: " << Error::get_text(e.code()) << endl;
00125     _exit(1);
00126   }
00127 
00128   return 0;
00129 }
